channel.title: Unable to Use
channel.description:
Okay. I downloaded the .zip files last night and only now just got the chance to put them into the sourcemods folder in the steamapps.
Now, there's no change in my Steam. And when I try to extract the files, I'm told there's nothing in them, despite the 2.6 gig and 1.6 gig .zip files. May I have some help?

item.title: Unable to Use
item.dc:creator: Neutralista
item.description:
Okay. I downloaded the .zip files last night and only now just got the chance to put them into the sourcemods folder in the steamapps.

Now, there’s no change in my Steam. And when I try to extract the files, I’m told there’s nothing in them, despite the 2.6 gig and 1.6 gig .zip files. May I have some help?
